5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Ubadah bin Samit that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“There will be leaders who will be distracted by matters and they will delay the prayer until after its proper time. So make your prayer with them voluntary.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا إِذَا أَخَّرُوا الصَّلاَةَ عَنْ وَقْتِهَا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning delaying the Prayer beyond its time
